Empty.NoTabsEnabled: All tabs are disabled in Asset Librarian settings. Enable at least one tab.

Filters.Title: Filters
Filters.UnavailableInCompendium: Custom fields unavailable in compendium index

Welcome.Title: Welcome to Asset Librarian
Welcome.SupportPatreonText: If you want to support development, take a look at membership options on Patreon.
Welcome.SupportKofiText: If you prefer, you can support via Ko-fi.
Welcome.DocsText: Need help getting started? Read the docs or ask in Discord.

CustomCategoryGroups.Name: Custom Category Groups
CustomCategoryGroups.Hint: Optional comma-separated extra category groups for Item browsing (for example: Relics, Recipes). Names must be unique and cannot reuse built-in groups.

TagRegistry.Name: Tag Registry
TagRegistry.Hint: Internal autocomplete cache for Asset Librarian category/filter tags.

TagGroupConfig.Name: Tag Group Configuration
TagGroupConfig.Hint: Mapping of custom filter tags into custom groups.

openTags.Name: Expanded Tags
openTags.Hint: Number of tag groups open by default (0 is all).

AllowPlayersSceneControl.Name: Allow Players Scene Control Button
AllowPlayersSceneControl.Hint: If enabled, players can see and use the Asset Librarian scene control button.

ShowWelcomeMessage.Name: Show Welcome Message
ShowWelcomeMessage.Hint: If enabled, GMs see the welcome card once per module version.

LastWelcomeVersion.Name: Last Welcome Version
LastWelcomeVersion.Hint: Internal setting storing the last module version that displayed the welcome card.

IncludedCompendiums.Name: Included Compendiums
IncludedCompendiums.Hint: Which compendiums to include when browsing.

IncludeWorld.Name: Include World Assets
IncludeWorld.Hint: Include world-level assets in the scan.

EnableImageScanning.Name: Enable Image Scanning
EnableImageScanning.Hint: Enable the Images tab to scan for image files.

IncludeWorldPath.Name: Include World Images
IncludeWorldPath.Hint: Scan the world directory for image files.

ShowNestedFolderContent.Name: Show All Nested Content
ShowNestedFolderContent.Hint: When selecting a folder, include content from all nested subfolders.

ImageScanPaths.Name: Image Scan Paths
ImageScanPaths.Hint: Comma-separated list of paths to scan for images.

ViewMode.Name: View Mode
ViewMode.Hint: How assets are displayed in the grid.

UseDiskThumbnailCache.Name: Use Disk Cache (Images)
UseDiskThumbnailCache.Hint: Persist image thumbnails to disk cache. Disk cache needs to be manually cleared.

UseDiskScenePreviewCache.Name: Use Disk Cache (Scene Previews)
UseDiskScenePreviewCache.Hint: Persist scene previews to disk cache. Disk cache needs to be manually cleared.

CategoryConfig.Name: Category Configuration
CategoryConfig.Hint: Mapping of system types to high-level categories.

Actor.Name: Show Actors
Actor.Hint: Include Actors in the Asset Librarian menu.

Item.Name: Show Items
Item.Hint: Include Items in the Asset Librarian menu.

JournalEntry.Name: Show Journals
JournalEntry.Hint: Include Journals in the Asset Librarian menu.

Scene.Name: Show Scenes
Scene.Hint: Include Scenes in the Asset Librarian menu.

RollTable.Name: Show Roll Tables
RollTable.Hint: Include Roll Tables in the Asset Librarian menu.

Playlist.Name: Show Playlists
Playlist.Hint: Include Playlists in the Asset Librarian menu.

Macro.Name: Show Macros
Macro.Hint: Include Macros in the Asset Librarian menu.

Cards.Name: Show Card Stacks
Cards.Hint: Include Card Stacks in the Asset Librarian menu.

Adventure.Name: Show Adventures
Adventure.Hint: Include Adventures in the Asset Librarian menu.

Compendiums.Name: Select Compendiums
Compendiums.Label: Select Compendiums
Compendiums.Hint: Select which compendiums to include in the scan.

Filters.Name: Custom Filter Fields
Filters.Label: Configure Filters
Filters.Hint: Customize the filter fields for the Asset Librarian.

Categories.Name: Category Configuration
Categories.Label: Configure Categories
Categories.Hint: Map system types to high-level categories.

TagGroups.Name: Tag Group Configuration
TagGroups.Label: Configure Tag Groups
TagGroups.Hint: Map custom tags into custom groups.

Compendiums.Hint: Select which compendiums to include when browsing in Compendium mode:

CustomFilters.Hint: Add custom fields to filter by. Path uses dot notation (e.g., system.level).
CustomFilters.Imported: Filter pack imported! Click Save to apply.

CategoryConfig.Hint: Assign system document types to high-level categories.
CategoryConfig.CustomGroupsValidationWarning: Some custom groups were ignored. Use comma-separated unique names (2-30 chars) and avoid built-in group names.
CategoryConfig.ResetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset category configuration to system defaults?

TagGroupConfig.Hint: Create custom groups and assign custom tags. Each tag can belong to only one group per document type.
TagGroupConfig.NoGroups: No groups yet. Click + to add one.
TagGroupConfig.ResetToDefaults: Tag group configuration reset to defaults.
TagGroupConfig.ResetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset tag group configuration?

Tagging.CategoryHint: Single tag used for the category bar.
Tagging.FilterHint: Tags used in the Filters panel.
Tagging.BulkSkippedHint: {count} documents are excluded (for example locked compendium entries).
Tagging.BulkCommonHint: Checked tags are currently on every selected document. Uncheck any to remove them from all selected documents.
Tagging.BulkClearFilters: Clear all filter tags before applying add/remove
Tagging.BulkNoEditable: No editable documents in the current results.
Tagging.BulkSummary: Bulk tagging complete: {updated} updated, {failed} failed, {skipped} skipped.
Tagging.NoPermission: You do not have permission to edit tags on this document.
Tagging.InvalidDocument: Unable to load this document for tag editing.

Images.RelativeHint: Paths are relative to Foundry's data directory.

Helpers.ConfirmChangeBackground: Do you want to change the background of {sceneName}?
